title: Tree Plantation Drive
description: A community event to plant 500+ saplings in the local park to celebrate World Environment Day.

title: Clean Water Awareness Camp
description: Awareness camp on water conservation and distribution of water filters to 100 families.

title: Solar Lamp Distribution
description: Distributed 200 solar lamps to students in rural areas to support their education.

title: Eco-Friendly Festival
description: Organized a festival promoting eco-friendly practices and alternatives to single-use plastics.
